review: Outstanding with her overall attitude towards parents & kids while their treatment. Absolute recommendation to all parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I like Doctor Niti because of her ability to deal with kids. There was no waiting time as schedule of appointment came in advance.

review:
I am very much satisfied with doctor’s exact diagnosis & treatment with minimum medication
My child is perfectly healthy now

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Niti Agrawal is a very friendly and patient doctor. She hears the problems very carefully and gives apt solutions. Doesn’t believe in unnecessary medications and is also available over phone in case of emergency. Highly recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was good experience. Medicine prescribed by her is suited for my child. I am satisfied with her diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i went to dr Niti for my child's fever and stomach infection, i didn't have to wait much..the doctor explained everything very patiently in details and with minimum medication my child got recovered within few days . she is always available on phone in case of emergency. i will highly recommend the doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Niti is a very kind hearted and a good human being. We hv over 18 years relation between a doctor and a patient. Having two children.Our both children are her regular patients from birth.   Her way of treatment has no word to explain about her talent and experience. We love her a lot and pray for Heartiest Best Wishes for her life. 

Her husband Dr. Sunil Agarwal is also same in the field and a brilliant orthopedician .

tags: None
review: Excellent. I am very much impressed by doctor Niti Agarwal. She is very kind heart doctor. I was very tensed about my baby health but after doctor consulted i was relaxed. Thank you very much doctor.
